issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The call to set replication is called prior to uploading the archive file to hdfs, which does not throw an error, but the replication never gets set.

This has a significant impact on large jobs (especially hash joins) due to too many tasks hitting the data nodes.
fields.summary: Set replication for archive called before file exists

comments.body: Fixes replication of archive file on hdfs.

Regarding the build error - I missed adding some files to svn as part of my first commit for HIVE-7342, added them now.
I have started another pre-commit build for this one. Sorry for the trouble!
Attaching file again for precommit tests.
